attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BAN SIZE 0 MODEL BEING USED ON UK CATWALKS, AS WE FEEL THIS IS EFFECTING THE HEALTH & MINDSET OF WOMEN & CHILDREN OF TODAYS SOCIETY.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the BLOCK CAPS as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
